item.title: Input Field
item.description: Content structure Input types Basic Sample id * This value can not be changed afterwards Sample id * The sample ID you provided is not valid! Sample id * This value can not be changed afterwards <div class="m-auto block" style="width: 500px;"> <div class="relative mt-5"> <label class="absolute top-0 bg-white text-gray-700 px-1 " style="transform: translate3d(13px, -12px, 0)" for="example">Sample id *</label> <input class="py-2 px-4 border-gray-900 bg-white rounded-md border-1 w-full" type="text" id="example" placeholder="eg.

item.title: Guideline
item.description: Content structure Guideline types Use guidelines to help the user check content goes here Different types of guidelines to give context to the user close content goes here <div class="p-6 rounded-lg border-green-200 border-4 border-l-28 mb-4"> <div class=""> <div class="mt-0 -ml-2 pl-2 relative font-bold mb-1"> Use guidelines to help the user <div class="guideline-icon flex items-center text-center"> <span class="bg-green-600 rounded-full w-4 h-4 text-center text-white leading-none inline-block m-auto"> <i class="material-icons" style="font-size: 0.

item.title: About Osociety
item.description: This styleguide aims to bring order and consistency to OncoDNA platforms and processes behind building those We elevate user experience and increase the sped and efficiency of how we design and build products. Guide with documentation The purpose of our documentation is to be a partner who will help solve a problem when people build with Osociety. We always aim to make our documentation available at the right moment and in the right context.
